67379.「<pc>さま……。\n 災厄の王の 魔力により\n その地は 常に深い闇に覆わ:
<pc>... This land has always been
shrouded in deep darkness due to the
King of Calamity's magic.

67380.「私たち 世告げの姫のチカラで\n その地を覆う 闇を払いましょう。:
We, the Princesses of Prophecy, will use our
power to dispel this darkness.

67382.「<cs_pchero>さま……。\n 災厄の王は 目覚めてはいますが\n 深い:
<cs_pchero>...
The King of Calamity is awake, yet seems to
be in a deep slumber...

67383.「この世界が 実体を保っていられる時間は\n 災厄の王が目覚めるまでの ３０分ほ:
This world can only maintain its form for about thirty minutes, where the King of Calamity will then awaken... We must not
waste this opportunity.

67385.「さすがは 時の王者 <cs_pchero>さま。\n みごとな戦いでした。:
As expected of the Time Sovereign.
That was a splendid battle.

67386.「これで……アストルティアは 破滅から\n 救われました。この記念すべき日は 永:
With that...Astoltia is now saved from utter
destruction. This momentous day will forever
be etched in the memories of all.

67387.「我々 世告げの姫は\n 災厄の王が倒されたという報せを\n これから 各国の王:
We shall go to the kings of the world and
relay the news that the King of Calamity
has finally been defeated.

67388.「<cs_pchero>さま。\n あなたこそ 真の王者と呼ぶにふさわしい……。:
<cs_pchero>... You are indeed worthy
of being called a true Sovereign. You have
our most sincere thanks.

67391.「妙ですね……。\n 災厄の王が 倒されたというのに\n まがまがしい邪気は 辺:
How strange... The King of Calamity is gone,
yet I feel an evil presence that still
lingers...

67392.「なぜ 今まで 気がつかなかったのか……。\n 災厄の王が鎮座する場所としては\:
How did I not notice it before...? This place
is far too quiet as an abode of the King of
Calamity...

67393.「災厄の王……まがまがしい邪気……。\n そして この神殿の静けさ……。:
The King of Calamity...this evil presence...
And the peacefulness of this temple...

67394.「ああ……。なんということでしょう。\n これは まさか……！？:
Ah... what could this mean?
Could it be...?!

67396.「おお……。なぜ ここまで試練を与える……。\n これ以上 何を試すというのだ…:
Ahh...why do you put us through so many
trials...? What more is there to test...? What
more can we do...as powerless as we are...?

67397.「これまで 私たちの やってきたことは\n すべて 無駄な あがきだったというの:
Everything we've done up until now has just
been for naught!

67399.「……すみません。心配を かけましたね。: I'm sorry to worry you all.

67400.「<cs_pchero>さま。お話ししたいことが……。\n のちほど 落陽の草原:
<cs_pchero>. There is something I must
discuss with you... Please join me at
Cosette's place when you are able.

72784.「今こそ 時の王者のチカラで\n 災厄の王を 討つのです！:
Now! Use the power of the Time Sovereign and
strike down the King of Calamity for good!
